Package portfolios

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BetterStockPortfolio
    The BetterStockPortfolio interface extends the functionality of the StockPortfolio interface allowing for the buying and selling of stock on a certain day.
    StockPortfolio
    The portfolios.StockPortfolio interface represent operations on a portfolio of stocks, allowing for the addition and removal of stocks as well as the calculation of total value on a given day.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPortfolioTest<T extends SimpleStockPortfolio>
    Abstract test class for portfolios.
    AdvancedStockPortfolio
    The AdvancedStockPortfolio class extends the functionality of the original SimpleStockPortfolio implementation to include the new functions (i.e.
    AdvancedStockPortfolioTest
    Tests for advanced stock portfolios.
    SimpleStockPortfolio
    The portfolios.SimpleStockPortfolio represent a regular, simplified stock portfolio with limited operations.
    SimpleStockPortfolioTest
    The SimpleStockPortfolioTest class represents tests for methods on SimpleStockPortfolio objects.
